segments.text: Have you found another job yet , Sally ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven't , but I've seen several interesting advertisements in the paper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of job are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Either something in the hotel business or something to do with travel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You haven't had any experience in either of those fields .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know.But I'd like to try.Look , here are some advertisements that I've cut out .
segments.speaker: S2
